section.title: Introduction
section.p: The Lucene application extensions project aims to provide a template for creating Lucene based web applications, and a set of libraries for easily using Lucene in your application. Eventually these extensions will move over to the Lucene proper along with full documentation. For more information on these goals please read this Proposal . TODO: go into more depth here.
